translations: 养育（foster 的现在分词）；哺育

phrs.translation: 寄养家庭；抚养孤儿的家庭
n. 朱迪·福斯特（美国女演员）

sentences.sentence: We are committed to fostering new music talent.
sentences.translation: 我们致力于培养新的音乐人才。

sentences.sentence: Vocational schools should do a better job of fostering problem-solving skills and helping students work alongside robots.
sentences.translation: 职业学校应该更加努力地培养学生解决问题和与机器协作的能力。

sentences.sentence: If no one owns the resource concerned, no one has an interest in conserving it or fostering it: fish is the best example of this.
sentences.translation: 如果没人拥有相关的资源，就没有人有兴趣去保护或培育它：鱼类就是最好的例子。
